name: redux
description: Predictable state container for JavaScript apps

issues.title: Explore using Rollup for UMD builds
issues.body:
Our compiled code isn't looking nice because of all the junk code generated by Babel for ES6 modules:
https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/redux/3.0.3/redux.js

While this is not technically an issue, it would be nice to get a neater compiled output.
Maybe we can explore using [Rollup](http://rollupjs.org/) for this.

- [ ] Turn off ES6 module transformation in Babel
- [ ] Try to make both CJS (`./lib/`) and UMD (`./dist/`) builds with [Rollup](http://rollupjs.org/) instead
- [ ] Of course Babel should still be turned on for the actual transpiling

If somebody wants to explore this feel free to.

issues.title: Need help polishing Gitbook
issues.body:
I have Gitbook working in [`rewrite-docs-again`](https://github.com/gaearon/redux/tree/rewrite-docs-again) branch but there are a few rough edges.

* `npm run docs:watch` (launching `gitbook serve`) is extremely slow on changes. Recompiling a book might take 7 seconds. Is that normal, or is something misconfigured?

* When navigating gitbook pages, I see flashes of unstyled content. This is a critical problem. Can we fix them? Does it only happen locally? It doesn't appear like anybody responds to Gitbook issues so I didn't bother filing.

I know Gitbook allows some customization. Maybe veterans can help me out?

cc @theaqua @xgrommx

- [x] Flashes of unstyled content (https://github.com/GitbookIO/gitbook/pull/847)
- [x] Syntax highlighting looks bad especially with JSX (we should use Prism instead of Highlight)
- [x] Add link to edit docs? (#449)
- [x] Cmd+click should open new tab (https://github.com/GitbookIO/gitbook/issues/846, https://github.com/GitbookIO/gitbook/pull/919)
- [x] Remove webfonts (#395, https://github.com/GitbookIO/gitbook/issues/850)
- [ ] Anchor links often don't work the first time (https://github.com/GitbookIO/gitbook/issues/920)
- [ ] Anchors should have permalinks like in React docs (https://github.com/rlmv/gitbook-plugin-anchors)
- [ ] /Dev/ Watches dies for 10 seconds on every second change

issues.title: Gulp Deploy to GitHub Pages - No static files
issues.body:
Curious as to why there is a `gulp deploy` task that deploys to Github pages when the build process produces a Node server app. This build doesn't currently work on Github pages. Deploy task works fine, seems to be something that wasn't compensated for in the build process.

Am I missing something?

issues.title: implement auth with the Flux based router
issues.body:
@koistya  mind giving an example of how to setup an auth flow with the current setup?
One of the biggest perks of switching to react-router is the out of box support for auth by using nested routes. thanks!  ref #21
